title: Stuff with models
description: A short description of the post.
contents:
Nice plot down below!


library(tidyverse)

ggplot(mtcars, aes(disp, mpg)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth() + 
  labs(title = "A Boring Plot") +
  theme(text = element_text(family = "Roboto"))
